titleStmt.title: A spirituall trumpet exciting and preparing to the Christian warfare. Sounded first in the vtmost parts of the Lords campe, to one wing of the armie, now in the midst for the benefit of all. By William Iemmat, Master of Arts, and preacher of Gods word at the Lechlade in Gloucester shire.
titleStmt.author: Jemmat, William, 1596?-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. H[aviland] for Iohn Bartlet at the gilt Cup in Cheape-side,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
